pr_title: HHH-13870 - Extract task action in Gradle plugin to fix up-to-date check

timeline.message:
HHH-13870 - Extract task action in Gradle plugin to fix up-to-date checks

Lambdas are not allowed and cause the compile task to be always out of date

timeline.bodyText: I would suggest adding some comment explaining why lambda is not a viable solution (including the gradle bug link) so we can avoid confusion and raise awareness of when the lambda can be reverted back.
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu
